abstract: The Metropolitan Museum of Art's new galleries of Islamic art will include a 12th century game set from ancient Iran. It's chess, with a difference.
snippet: The Metropolitan Museum of Art's new galleries of Islamic art will include a 12th century game set from ancient Iran. It's chess, with a difference.
lead_paragraph: When the Metropolitan Museum of Art's new galleries of Islamic art open on Nov. 1, among the treasures on display will be one of the oldest chess sets in the world. Sort of.

headline.main: An Ancient Chess Set at the Met, or Close Enough
